key_risks: Underperformance and reduced growth guidance for 2025
High competitive pressure in the insurtech sector
Regulatory compliance complexities across multiple jurisdictions
Geographic dependence on North America and Europe
controversies: Fraud investigation by Levi & Korsinsky for potential securities law violations
Reputational damage from ongoing legal scrutiny
social_issues: Reputation at risk due to fraud allegations
Need to maintain customer trust and retention in a rapidly evolving industry
governance_issues: Potential governance failures highlighted by the fraud investigation
Challenges in managing operational complexities from acquisitions
